description: Provide building materials for contracts to construct/build on parks and/or recreation areas, provide details in solicitation. Bidders who request a debriefing will get feedback on the bid solicitation. Suppliers may supply for both campsites and Ingonish cabin.
tags: Providing building materials for cabin construction
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** 5P126-230074_B - Building Materials for Cabins

**Reference Number:** WS4265046062-Doc4398529388

## Tender Overview

This is a tender cancellation notice for the above-mentioned project, superseding a previous bid solicitation dated November 14, 2023, with a closing date of December 15, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session is offered to interested bidders upon request.

**Agency:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)

**Location:** Nova Scotia (Region de livraison: Nouvelle-Écosse)

**Project Objective:** Supply and delivery of building materials for the construction of two cabins at the Mkwesaqtuk/Cap-Rouge campground and the repair of a damaged cabin at Ingonish. The current expected delivery date is December 31, 2023.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** White, Brodie (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** brodie.white@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18543426?extsite=MTg1NDM0MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Information

This project is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

The tender closing date is February 14, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Please note that the tender is no longer active due to being cancelled.

The selection criteria for this tender is based on the lowest price. As per the notice, bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days from the receipt of notification of being unsuccessful.

To view this opportunity, please visit SAP Ariba at the provided notice URL.
